description: Roots of 'non-palindromic squares remaining square when written backwards'.
comments: Those with trailing zeros are excluded.Union of ordered entries of A106323 and A106324. - _Lekraj Beedassy_, May 02 2005
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Square Number
mathematica: r[n_] := FromDigits[Reverse[IntegerDigits[n]]]; Select[Range[2200], Mod[#, 10] != 0 && IntegerQ[Sqrt[r[#^2]]] && r[#^2] != #^2 &] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Mar 08 2011 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Nov 15 1998.
